revised_title: Elastic Spheroidal Shells and Spheroids of Incompressible Liquid: Dynamical Problems and Solutions
tldr: The author presents a mathematical analysis of the dynamics of elastic spheroidal shells and spheroids filled with incompressible liquid. They develop equations to describe the behavior of these structures under various conditions and provide solutions for specific cases. The study has implications for understanding the behavior of solid materials and fluid-filled structures in engineering and physics.
